sense.name: any flesh-eating organism
sense.commentary: CARNIVORE[+entity][+organism][+flesh_eating] Note: not restricted to mammals of the Carnivora order
sense.examples: T-rex was the largest carnivore among the dinosaurs. This plant is considered a carnivore because it traps insects in its flower and digests them. This snake is a carnivore and will only eat live animals such as field mice. John described himself as a carnivore who doesn't like 'planty' foods.

sense.name: mammals which are members of the zoological order Carnivora
sense.examples: The wolf and the lion are both classified as carnivores. Carnivores are responsible for the recent predation on the local deer population.
